title: :wastebasket:   Trashing a picture
description:
You can put a picture to the trash to prevent it from appearing in the `/cute-pic` album.

To do so, you will first need to find the original message of the picture in <#${picChannelId}>.
​

fields.name: Putting a picture to the trash
fields.value:
First, click on the **trash button (:wastebasket:)** of the message of the picture you want to put to the trash.
Then confirm the action by clicking on the **:wastebasket: button** in the confirmation message.
